<Text: Kenny Williams (announcer):  He was best known as the announcer of many game shows produced by Merrill Heatter and Bob Quigley (including "Hollywood Squares", "High Rollers", "Gambit" and others).>

Text: Kenny Williams (announcer):  He did one show for Mark Goodson-Bill Todman Productions, "Two for the Money", in 1952.
